put.description: The operation to create or update the extension.

parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Create Machine Extension operation.

201.description: HTTP 201 (Created) if the operation was successfully started and will complete asynchronously.

ResourcePatch.description: Object containing updates for patch operations.

uuid.description: Gets or sets a unique identifier for this resource.

vCenterId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the vCenter resource in which this resource pool resides.

moRefId.description: Gets or sets the vCenter MoRef (Managed Object Reference) ID for the resource pool.

inventoryItemId.description: Gets or sets the inventory Item ID for the resource pool.

moName.description: Gets or sets the vCenter Managed Object name for the resource pool.

cpuSharesLevel.description:
Gets or sets CPUSharesLevel which specifies the CPU allocation level for this pool.
This property is used in relative allocation between resource consumers.

cpuReservationMHz.description:
Gets or sets CPUReservationMHz which specifies the CPU size in MHz that is guaranteed
to be available.

cpuLimitMHz.description:
Gets or sets CPULimitMHz which specifies a CPU usage limit in MHz.
Utilization will not exceed this limit even if there are available resources.

memSharesLevel.description:
Gets or sets CPUSharesLevel which specifies the memory allocation level for this pool.
This property is used in relative allocation between resource consumers.

memReservationMB.description:
Gets or sets MemReservationMB which specifies the guaranteed available memory in
megabytes.

memLimitMB.description:
Gets or sets MemLimitMB specifies a memory usage limit in megabytes.
Utilization will not exceed the specified limit even if there are available resources.

customResourceName.description: Gets the name of the corresponding resource in Kubernetes.

provisioningState.description: Gets or sets the provisioning state.

extendedLocation.description: Gets or sets the extended location.

tags.description: Gets or sets the Resource tags.

type.description: Gets or sets the type of the resource.

kind.description: Metadata used by portal/tooling/etc to render different UX experiences for resources of the same type; e.g. ApiApps are a kind of Microsoft.Web/sites type.  If supported, the resource provider must validate and persist this value.

nextLink.description: Url to follow for getting next page of ResourcePools.

VICredential.description: Username / Password Credentials to connect to vcenter.

username.description: Gets or sets username to connect with the vCenter.

password.description: Gets or sets the password to connect with the vCenter.

reason.description: The reason for the condition's status.

message.description: A human readable message indicating details about the status.

severity.description: Severity with which to treat failures of this type of condition.

lastUpdatedAt.description: The last update time for this condition.

uuid.description: Gets or sets a unique identifier for this resource.

fqdn.description: Gets or sets the FQDN/IPAddress of the vCenter.

port.description: Gets or sets the port of the vCenter.

version.description: Gets or sets the version of the vCenter.

instanceUuid.description: Gets or sets the instance UUID of the vCenter.

connectionStatus.description: Gets or sets the connection status to the vCenter.

customResourceName.description: Gets the name of the corresponding resource in Kubernetes.

credentials.description: Username / Password Credentials to connect to vcenter.

provisioningState.description: Gets or sets the provisioning state.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the virtual disk.

diskSizeGB.description: Gets or sets the disk total size.

deviceKey.description: Gets or sets the device key value.

diskMode.description: Gets or sets the disk mode.

controllerKey.description: Gets or sets the controller id.

unitNumber.description: Gets or sets the unit number of the disk on the controller.

deviceName.description: Gets or sets the device name.

diskType.description: Gets or sets the disk backing type.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the virtual disk.

label.description: Gets or sets the label of the virtual disk in vCenter.

diskObjectId.description: Gets or sets the disk object id.

diskSizeGB.description: Gets or sets the disk total size.

deviceKey.description: Gets or sets the device key value.

diskMode.description: Gets or sets the disk mode.

controllerKey.description: Gets or sets the controller id.

unitNumber.description: Gets or sets the unit number of the disk on the controller.

deviceName.description: Gets or sets the device name.

diskType.description: Gets or sets the disk backing type.

Condition.description: Condition defines an extension to status.

reason.description: The reason for the condition's status.

message.description: A human readable message indicating details about the status.

severity.description: Severity with which to treat failures of this type of condition.

extendedLocation.description: Gets or sets the extended location.

tags.description: Gets or sets the Resource tags.

type.description: Gets or sets the type of the resource.

kind.description: Metadata used by portal/tooling/etc to render different UX experiences for resources of the same type; e.g. ApiApps are a kind of Microsoft.Web/sites type.  If supported, the resource provider must validate and persist this value.

OsType.description: Defines the different types of VM guest operating systems.

osType.description: Gets or sets the type of the os.

toolsRunningStatus.description: Gets or sets the current running status of VMware Tools running in the guest operating system.

toolsVersionStatus.description: Gets or sets the current version status of VMware Tools installed in the guest operating system.

toolsVersion.description: Gets or sets the current version of VMware Tools.

memorySizeMB.description: Gets or sets memory size in MBs for the vm.

numCPUs.description: Gets or sets the number of vCPUs for the vm.

numCoresPerSocket.description: Gets or sets the number of cores per socket for the vm. Defaults to 1 if unspecified.

cpuHotAddEnabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether virtual processors can be added while this virtual machine is running.

cpuHotRemoveEnabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether virtual processors can be removed while this virtual machine is running.

memoryHotAddEnabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether memory can be added while this virtual machine is running.

networkInterfaces.description: Gets or sets the list of network interfaces associated with the virtual machine.
Gets or sets the list of network interfaces associated with the virtual machine.

SCSIControllerType.description: Defines the different types of SCSI controllers.

VirtualSCSISharing.description: Defines the sharing mode for sharing the SCSI bus.

VirtualSCSIController.description: This data object type contains the properties of a SCSI controller device attached to a virtual machine that is reported by the controller.

type.description: Gets or sets the controller type.

controllerKey.description: Gets or sets the key of the controller.

busNumber.description: Gets or sets the bus number of the controller.

scsiCtlrUnitNumber.description: Gets or sets the SCSI controller unit number.

sharing.description: Gets or sets the sharing mode.

disks.description: Gets or sets the list of virtual disks associated with the virtual machine.

scsiControllers.description: Gets or sets the list of virtual SCSI controllers associated with the virtual machine.

disks.description: Gets or sets the list of virtual disks associated with the virtual machine.

vmUuid.description: Specifies the VM's unique SMBIOS ID.

status.description: The status of the hybrid machine agent.

lastStatusChange.description: The time of the last status change.

agentVersion.description: The hybrid machine agent full version.

type.description: Specifies the type of the extension; an example is "CustomScriptExtension".

typeHandlerVersion.description: Specifies the version of the script handler.

autoUpgradeMinorVersion.description: Indicates whether the extension should use a newer minor version if one is available at deployment time. Once deployed, however, the extension will not upgrade minor versions unless redeployed, even with this property set to true.

settings.description: Json formatted public settings for the extension.

protectedSettings.description: The extension can contain either protectedSettings or protectedSettingsFromKeyVault or no protected settings at all.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state, which only appears in the response.

MachineExtensionProperties.description: Describes the properties of a Machine Extension.

forceUpdateTag.description: How the extension handler should be forced to update even if the extension configuration has not changed.

publisher.description: The name of the extension handler publisher.

type.description: Specifies the type of the extension; an example is "CustomScriptExtension".

typeHandlerVersion.description: Specifies the version of the script handler.

autoUpgradeMinorVersion.description: Indicates whether the extension should use a newer minor version if one is available at deployment time. Once deployed, however, the extension will not upgrade minor versions unless redeployed, even with this property set to true.

settings.description: Json formatted public settings for the extension.

protectedSettings.description: The extension can contain either protectedSettings or protectedSettingsFromKeyVault or no protected settings at all.

MachineExtensionUpdateProperties.description: Describes the properties of a Machine Extension.

type.description: Specifies the type of the extension; an example is "CustomScriptExtension".

typeHandlerVersion.description: Specifies the version of the script handler.

displayStatus.description: The short localizable label for the status.

message.description: The detailed status message, including for alerts and error messages.

MachineExtensionInstanceView.description: Describes the Machine Extension Instance View.

nextLink.description: The uri to fetch the next page of machine extensions. Call ListNext() with this to fetch the next page of extensions.

MachineExtensionsListResult.description: Describes the Machine Extensions List Result.

ProvisioningAction.description: Defines the different types of operations for guest agent.

GuestCredential.description: Username / Password Credentials to connect to guest.

username.description: Gets or sets username to connect with the guest.

password.description: Gets or sets the password to connect with the guest.

HttpProxyConfiguration.description: HTTP Proxy configuration for the VM.

nextLink.description: Url to follow for getting next page of GuestAgent.

allOf.description: The resource model definition for an Azure Resource Manager proxy resource. It will have everything other than required location and tags.

uuid.description: Gets or sets a unique identifier for this resource.

credentials.description: Username / Password Credentials to provision guest agent.

httpProxyConfig.description: HTTP Proxy configuration for the VM.

provisioningAction.description: Gets or sets the guest agent provisioning action.

status.description: Gets or sets the guest agent status.

customResourceName.description: Gets the name of the corresponding resource in Kubernetes.

provisioningState.description: Gets or sets the provisioning state.
